definitions.definition: A specialized, structured, grouping of functionally related segments , or analogous subunits , into units such as the head, the thorax, and the abdomen, particularly in various Arthropoda and Vertebrata .
A specialized, structured, grouping of functionally related molecules , forming the basis the physiology and structure of larger units such as cells and tissues.
A military unit of battalion or regiment size, in the Byzantine empire of the 8th - 11th centuries.

main_definition: ( morphology of segmented Metazoa ) A specialized, structured, grouping of functionally related segments , or analogous subunits , into units such as the head, the thorax, and the abdomen, particularly in various Arthropoda and Vertebrata .
secondary_definitions: ( physiology, dated ) A specialized, structured, grouping of functionally related molecules , forming the basis the physiology and structure of larger units such as cells and tissues.
( historical ) A military unit of battalion or regiment size, in the Byzantine empire of the 8th - 11th centuries.
